name: Diagosnake
description:
< GAMEPLAY >

You can move your snake diagonally (it is highlighted on the screen). When you move, a body is created connected the last 2 places the head of the snake was at. Every movement makes the body of the snake larger.  

Instead of moving you can also place a wall on any empty field (doesn't already contain a wall or player body). You can not move onto a wall. Each player has 3 walls so think strategically! 

After each move (movement of the snake or wall placement) it is the next players turn. 

The goal is to get the opponent stuck, i.e. unable to move.

< CONTROLS >

Left mouse - Move the snake

Right mouse - Place a wall

< CREDITS >

Idea: Niko Covic, Fran Karlovic

Art, music, sfx, code: Niko Covic

Made for Lowrezjam 2021
